document_data.name: ''Erevain's Broad Sword''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Erevain's broad sword''''' was an enchanted [[elf|elven]] [[broadsword]] that belonged to [[Erevain Blacksheaf]] until his death in [[1281 DR]].
document_data.Description: Broadswords were a rare sight among elves so ''Erevain's blade'' was quite unusual. Unlike other two-handed swords, this broadsword was significantly lighter at only {{SI|4|lb|k|long=yes}}.
document_data.Powers: ''Erevain's broad sword'' possessed ''+2'' enchantment as well as granted its user improved protection against spells slung via magic ''[[wand]]s'' and increased resistance to [[acid]].
document_data.History: This broadsword was forged in [[1221 DR]] by the [[Greycloaks]] of [[Evereska]]. Later, the sword belonged to Erevain Blacksheaf, an adventurer who traveled to [[Icewind Dale]] in 1281 DR. Subsequently, Erevain was slain by monstrous [[spider]]s of [[Dragon's Eye]] with his broadsword by his side.
